text:
I've noticed that some students could benefit from a reminder about basic courtesy and respect for others. When walking, they often don't give way to pedestrians, which can be especially challenging when I'm with my little one.

I hope schools can emphasize the importance of kindness, empathy, and consideration towards others. These values are just as essential as academic achievements.

I've noticed a concerning trend among some students on Lowland Rd. On multiple occasions, kids and teenagers have been blocking the pedestrian path, failing to give way to others. My husband, I, and numerous others have experienced this issue during morning, afternoon, and evening hours. It's essential for these students to learn and practice good manners, such as respecting shared spaces and yielding to others.

Dimension primary school is wonderful. The teachers and other supporting staff are caring and helpful, and they create a fun learning environment. The school has great activities that keep kids engaged. I feel my child is happy and learning a lot here!"
Beautiful campus. I just love their big play ground. Located at very cozy place, close to Kovan MRT. I am taking my MBA from this Institution under Cardiff Metropolitan University, UK.
Came here to get admission. School premises are good. Nice facaulty..
